    <h2>About Data-Set</h2>

    <div class="data-set">
        <h3>Common Voice by Mozilla</h3>
        <p>Mozilla Common Voice is an initiative to help teach machines how real people speak. Voice is natural, voice is human. That’s why we’re excited about creating usable voice technology for our machines.</p>
        <p>Data link from <a href="https://commonvoice.mozilla.org/en">here</a> and here is <a href="https://storage.googleapis.com/common-voice-prod-prod-datasets/cv-corpus-19.0-delta-2024-09-13/cv-corpus-19.0-delta-2024-09-13-ar.tar.gz?X-Goog-Algorithm=GOOG4-RSA-SHA256&X-Goog-Credential=gke-prod%40moz-fx-common-voice-prod.iam.gserviceaccount.com%2F20241128%2Fauto%2Fstorage%2Fgoog4_request&X-Goog-Date=20241128T185530Z&X-Goog-Expires=43200&X-Goog-SignedHeaders=host&X-Goog-">Direct download link</a>.</p>
    </div>

    <h2>Data-set Details</h2>
    <p>Arabic Common Voice Delta Segment 19.0 with 227 mp3 audio files.</p>
